title: Movin...BUSTED
content:
[url=http://www.dumpalink.com/media/1148140929/The_Best_Way_To_Bust_A_Pedophile]www.dumpalink.com/media/1..._Pedophile[/url]

Hahahaha, this is awesome. The chat log reading is hilarious, and the fact that the guy believes the ridiculously poor acting on the girl's part is hysterical. I love how the guy just sort of talks to him like a teacher would talk to a kindergartener.[center]TOUGH GUYS DON'T FOLLOW FADS[/center]

title: Re: Movin...BUSTED
content:
